CheckTitle: Check if ALB has 'routing.http.drop_invalid_header_fields.enabled' set to true.
Description: Checks if Application Load Balancers have 'routing.http.drop_invalid_header_fields.enabled' set to true. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if this attribute is not set to true.
Risk: Without dropping invalid header fields, the load balancer could pass malformed headers to applications, potentially causing security risks.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that your ALB has 'routing.http.drop_invalid_header_fields.enabled' set to true.
